title: [BUG] SKGLView doesn't work correctly on Blazor running on iOS
body:
**Description**

Blazor's SKGLView doesn't render some elements when run on iOS. It does work on all desktop browsers I've tried (Safari, Chrome, Edge, etc). I didn't try it on Android yet.

SKGLView:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2669419/168793503-e92fb335-8013-4a2c-b0f4-0dd425083044.png)

SKCanvasView:

![IMG_3413](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2669419/168867118-cf186e85-ee25-46b2-89bb-439560594e09.PNG)

**Code**

The code that draws Methanol and Acetone columns in the above flowsheet is https://github.com/DanWBR/dwsim/blob/windows/DWSIM.Drawing.SkiaSharp/GraphicObjects/Shapes/RigorousColumn.vb#L116

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  Blazor View (preview.256)
